updateCompany(long, String, String) - Method in interface CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.repositories.CompanyRepository
 
updateCompany(Company) - Method in interface CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.services.AdminService
Updating Company Object In DB (Email,Password).
updateCompany(Company) - Method in class CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.services.AdminServiceImpl
Update Company A method that receives a company object validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library)
and uses the CompanyRepository.class to update the company with the received new parameters (email, Password) in the data base.
UpdateCompany(Company) - Method in class CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.webServices.AdminWebService
Update Company A method that receives a company (JSON) from client in the Request Body - and updates the Company In the DB using the AdminServiceImplantion.class

Updating Coupon In the DB (Expiration Date,Price).
updateCoupon(long, long, Date, Double) - Method in class CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.services.CompanyServiceImpl
Update Coupon A method that receives a couponId,companyId,EndDate,Price validates it (in The Entity itself - Using "lombok" library)
and uses the CouponRepository.class to update the coupon with the received new parameters (Expiration date, Price) in the data base.
UpdateCoupon(HttpSession, Coupon) - Method in class CouponSystemProjectJB.CoupoSystemFinalProject.webServices.CompanyWebService
Update Coupon A method that receives a coupon (JSON) from client in the Request Body and the client details by the current Session - and updates the Coupon In the DB using the CompanyServiceImplantion.class
